Update the information related to snow at one level zone

Update the information related to snow at one level zone

stateLZ(htemp, hprecip, scaob, modelSnow, modelPrecipLZ, gca, sca, spd, wcd,
  nsno, alfa, ny)

Arguments

htemp
temperature for each elevation zone
hprecip
precipitation for each elevation zone
scaob
snow coverage observation
modelSnow
list of parameters related to snow list(nbLevelZone,unitsnow,n0,Ws,TS,CX,CFR,CGLAC,gca,UP)
modelPrecipLZ
list of parameters related to precipLZ list(nbLevelZone,Plr,hfelt,midmetp)
gca
fraction of glacier pr elevation zone, fraction of glacier covered area pr elevation zone
sca
snow coverage (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)
spd
Snow Water Equivalent in BV (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)
wcd
Free Water in BV (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)
nsno
number of event (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)
alfa
alfa parameter i nedbor gamma fordeling (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)
ny
ny parameter i nedbor gamma fordeling (NEED MORE EXPLANATION)

Examples

## Not run: ------------------------------------
# stateLZ()
## ---------------------------------------------
